fields.headline: Luxury hotel with wheelchair access
fields.bodyText: · Suzanne Duckett writes: I would recommend Seaham Hall & Spa, County Durham, which has a number of rooms with wheelchair access and, more importantly, complete access to its luxurious spa, where a range of treatments are on offer. Double rooms with bed and breakfast start at GBP175; "Day rituals" at the spa, which include three separate treatments, lunch and full use of all the facilities, cost GBP125. The Serenity Spa at Seaham Hall, Lord Byron's Walk, County Durham, 0191 5161550, www.seaham-serenityspa.com. · Suzanne Duckett is author of The Spa Directory (GBP12.99, Carlton Books).
